website_summaries.verdict: A top choice for those looking for an inexpensive yet elegant chandelier, but prepare to put in a little work assembling and installing it.
pros: Multiple lengths, so you can easily customize the height
Comes in a variety of mounts and finishes (oiled bronze, brushed nickel, chrome)
cons: Assembly and installation can be a handful, and you’ll definitely benefit by having another person help
Some reports of missing parts upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Looks so expensive!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this chandelier to go in our small dining room & I couldn’t be happier! The side shade is composed of metal and thick plastic while the base is a glass diffuser. We replaced a 3-light candelabra style light and I swear this one is much more bright. It looks lovely both off and on. As others have mentioned, the directions are not great. The problem is that there is no key to explain what parts they are referring to. The seller did email with revised installation instructions, but I never opened the email. I have replaced my fair share of light fixtures and this was pretty manageable, taking about 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: breakofday5

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Clear Instructions, Quick Service
customer_reviews.text: This hanging fixture sits above our kitchen table and replaces an old light that created glare. this new light fixture has frosted glass that disperses the light so nicely over the table. Plus, since the top is open, the light bulbs fill the ceiling with light which scatters around the kitchen. Having the flexibility to set the hanging length from 6 - 48" is a bonus. All in all I recommend highly for those needing a fixture with a mid-century feel that is easy to hang and a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Perper

customer_reviews.title: Modern style, sketchy directions....
customer_reviews.text: I saw this chandelier a few months ago and kept coming back to it. Finally purchased it! It is just as gorgeous as I thought. I was thrilled that it was inexpensive compared to others. It's a more modern style, and it's great. The only negative is that because the directions were rather incomplete, it wasn't the easiest install. Took me and hubby about 2.5 hours, which was crazy, when all was said and done. Had to go back a few times as there is a lot left unsaid in the directions. Other than that great chandelier. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Eggert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light
customer_reviews.text: Good quality light! I especially love the multiple lengths so you can customize the height. We bought two other pieces from this collection as well. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kerrieleighm

customer_reviews.title: This merchant deserves rock star status — we love the ceiling light
customer_reviews.text: This merchant deserves rock star status — we love the ceiling light...it looks modern and classic in a bedroom, and we were able to adjust it to the proper height with no problem. But Sulis Decor gets the win on this purchase! My husband didn’t see the picture and was in hurry to install this so he accidentally threw away the defuser piece (it is packaged at the very bottom) and I was able to contact them and they were able to get us another. I have purchase three fixtures from Sulis and they are the go-to merchant for us!
customer_reviews.author: cphilburn

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary light
customer_reviews.text: The chandelier is beautiful! I put it above my kitchen table and it goes perfect with my newly painted cabinets. The delivery was quick and easy. The chandelier was also wrapped very well. It was very easy to install for my contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Darrine

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp for our dining room but difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so we've installed many a light fixtures and this one looked relatively straight forward once I looked at the picture and instructions (although they weren't great). The most difficult part was connecting to the junction box with the parts supplied. The two screws that hold the fixture up to the ceiling are difficult to get just right. We did it several times before we were happy with it. Other than that, I would recommend waiting until the light is hung before attaching the diffuser and shade. Otherwise you risk breaking the diffuser since it's made of glass.
customer_reviews.author: RollTide

customer_reviews.title: A bit tricky to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This light looks nice when done but the method they use to attach the cables in regards to adjusting them so the light is level when installed is very tricky to get right. It seems they could have a better way to adjust the cable length. A lot to like about the light and would be a great product if they improved the adjustments on the cables. I am your average DIY guy so it wasn't an impossible task, but just frustrating to have to deal with something that could be much simpler and easier to use. Make sure its balanced before you put it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: good light. challenging installation instructions
customer_reviews.text: overall good purchase and product here. We ordered the flush mount light and found the instructions to be dead wrong. Firstly, the ball-end nuts they provide are not even needed. Throw them away. Secondly, the instructions say to place the screws into the ceiling box facing down. This is not correct and will lead to a ton of wasted time! Install the mounting screws by screwing them into the installation plate, then take the light and push it to the ceiling letting the head of the screws come throw the top of the lighting fixture. You can then tighten the screws to get the light to sit flush against the ceiling. good luck !
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Updated Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews have complained about the instructions. I bought ours in June 2020. The instructions have clearly been updated since those other reviews. There are still some unclear points... but overall the instructions are fine. If you like the light... then do not be put off by those that had bad instructions a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: DRAnderson

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: There were so many good reviews on this and I was so excited to put it up. I have to say, in person it looks cheap. It's also kind of big for this kid of light and winds up looking strange and out of place. It's not awful and I'm going to leave it up (because it was kind of a pain to install) but I won't be buying any more of these. For an extra $20 I could have gone to Home Depot and gotten something much nicer looking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are unclear, confusing; plate sent was wrong one
customer_reviews.text: We were sent an attachment plate that did not look like what the instructions had listed. It did not fit and it compounded a frustrating experience of figuring out the assembly of this product. The seller sent revised instructions, 4 pages instead of the 1-page version. Unfortunately, it didn't help with the final attachment phase and we were hating this fixture by the time we had it working. And this is after completing another ceiling light installation, so we are not rank beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Di-

customer_reviews.title: Awesome retro style dining light at a fabulous price!
customer_reviews.text: We loved the retro light we had at our previous home but couldn't take it with us to the new place. I found this one on Amazon, which is similar but larger than our old one, and this size worked out even better for our new dining space. Our electrician had no trouble installing it. We put it on the dimmer switch so we can control the brightness, which I recommend if you want ambiance or just don't need it at full power all the time. The price was fabulous, too. Our guests have commented on how pretty it is and we agree!
customer_reviews.author: VWBugGeek

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Modern
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these fixtures to update my 1926 bungalow. They are super attractive and very easy to install. The ceiling footprint is large, but exactly what I needed hide all the cracks and blemishes from removing the old fixtures. They arrived on time packaged in very sturdy boxes. The glass plate was well protected as was the cloth and metal shades. The two bulb feature really lights up my dark hallways.
customer_reviews.author: vanbran

customer_reviews.title: Tricky instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful light fixture! This was my first time installing a light fixture but I do have to mention the instructions were not that user friendly. I ended up not even using the instructions and just figuring it out on my own. It turned out great and really looks nice in my dining room!
customer_reviews.author: A. Whitelow

customer_reviews.title: instructions inadequate took 2 hours to hang
customer_reviews.text: The electrical was the easy part. The base plate is hard screwed into the pole so you had to work with someone holding the light while someone with tiny hands tried to get the screws through the plate to install. Would not purchase again, but we had already taken down our existing heavy complex chandelier ( only took about 10 minutes to take down). The chandelier looks ok once installed. Two hours to hang one light fixture is insame
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love my light fixtures I got two they are beautiful. Be careful not to over look the frosted glass cover in between the box and styrofoam. I almost threw it away and I was looking because I knew there should be another piece. And then I almost dropped it. So glad my husband saw it
customer_reviews.author: P S.

customer_reviews.title: Not just glass and metal
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice once installed. Installation steps missed putting the washer over the screws to allow the chrome caps to go on else screw keeps pushing back. We just knew from experience else it's hard for first timer to know what to do with the washers. Also, the inside of metal is plastic and the diffuser is a glass plate and not bowl shaped. The inside of metal that shows from outside is plastic. We used led bulbs to avoid heating and damaging plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sapna J

customer_reviews.title: Engineering Didn’t think this one through
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nobody took into consideration how the design would impact installation.There was no easy way to be able to wire and hang this lamp specially when you are 15 feet above the ground it required to people or a very adept With incredible dexterity of one person. And by the time you got to that part it’s too late to think about returning it. Upsetting and I’m very fortunate that I had the patience to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Zingali Family

customer_reviews.title: I really like design and quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like design and quality. I would give 5 stars to these items, if did not find one very important thing: when I put glass diffuser I lost more the 50% of the light. I bought these lights to replace my old one in which I used only one bulb. Now I installed two, but I’m not sure that I got equal lights. Glass diffuser and canopy shouldn’t take out more than 50% of the light intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice chandelier for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the chandelier. It's a great improvement ,style wise, to what I had and not too expensive. I would recommend it. If you like the look of it- the quality is good. I did not install it, my husband did while I was at work so I cannot give an opinion as to the ease of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - but pain in the arse to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was a royal pain in the arse to assemble... the instructions seemed to missing a few important directions. Definitely not a Swedish design. I recommend that you have someone help you install, it's awkward hoisting it up - I nearly dropped it trying to do it by myself. All that aside, if you're handy, are able to read between the lines of poorly written/oddly illustrated instructions and have a helper who can handle your cursing, then I highly recommend this fixture. I also recommend installing a dimmer switch for it, as it looks beautiful dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Product is GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked this product and could not unpack it before as I am handicapped and had to wait for my contractor. I had bought the flush mount version for another house I remodeled. It also had problems The shade has a slash mark through it as well as a gray curvy 's' shape on it. Am I supposed to think this was quality controlled or a good product? Product is GARBAGE
customer_reviews.author: howard kornblum

customer_reviews.title: I cannot stop looking at it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a match to a larger one. It is so gorgeous. It looks like something that you would pay way more for and has an understated elegance to it. I love it so much - I cannot wait to get the larger light up. I would highly recommend this company. The packaging was amazing and the lights seriously look like something you see in a million dollar house
customer_reviews.author: Slakkie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! Very Subdued Lighting
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Very nice looking fixture. The Bad: Even when using two 1600 lumens (100 watt equivalents) LED bulbs it seems there is only 30 watts of lighting.
customer_reviews.author: WJW

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great ( 3-Light Semi Flush Mount Ceiling Light)
customer_reviews.text: The light looks great. There were no instructions packaged with the product, but it was a fairly standard lighting fixture install. The one odd thing to note was to put the log screws with threads down through the mount arm. Use the nuts to adjust the height to the right length for the decorative nuts to hold the fixture to the box. Took me about an hour to install by myself. Glass was chipped in the center of the glass, but the mounting nut hid it, so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: FranklyCrafty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS FIXTURE !!️
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture is truly stunning. Looks expensive, classy, modern yet with a flamboyant feel. Super reasonably priced. I can’t stop looking at it!
customer_reviews.author: R. guimaraes

customer_reviews.title: Light fixture with excellent design lines.
customer_reviews.text: Light fixture with excellent design lines. The base and exterior is brushed nickel. The sides use stiff like fabric while the bottom has white translucent glass to defuse the light. The mounting is the same as any standard fixture. All mounting hardware is included. The base has insulation, which is nice, but is a little challenging to find the mounting screws.
customer_reviews.author: DIYguy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light for a small dining room
customer_reviews.text: The light is beautiful in my small dining room/breakfast area. We bought an older house and are slowly renovating it. The house has just an average height ceiling in the dining room, so this fit perfectly. The amount of light is great! The delivery was fast. The light is awesome in looks. Only one downside.....it was just hard to install. The screws were too long and then trying to fit the two small holes over the screws was hard. Just took a little longer than we expected; but I would do it again because the light itself is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Only complaint is the small round nuts that actually hold the fixture up in place are very hard to hold and install and you have to play with it to figure out the depth. I would suggest either provide measurement in instructions or actually mark the screws with the exact depth. As a marketing strategy I would provide an installation video link 😀 Be the company that is known for easy installation. This is actually 3rd light I have bought, saddened that you don’t have a 4foot ceiling mounted kitchen fixture in the same style.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice light but a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for my kitchen because I have a pendant light from the same brand in my dining room. The pendant light is really pretty, but this flush mount light turned up with a beige shade (looks white in the photos). The shade also has a large seam that’s quite visible to the naked eye. You can see it on my photo. The shade protrudes down quite a bit from the metal cage and the 60w lightbulbs can’t shine well enough through the diffuser and the beige shade. I’ve returned this light and went with a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: david p.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light for price
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, but there are some things that are a little annoying. The metal frame doesn't sit very well on top, but it's not enough to have me return in. I got 2 for both guest rooms and both have the same issue. Gives off a good amount of light and better than a standard run of the mill light so I am happy!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this light. I initially purchased the similar light fixture that hung from the ceiling, but found that it was too long. So I purchased this one instead because I really liked the design of it, and I'm very happy that I did. We placed it over our dining table and it looks great. It's very eye-catching and has that sleek, modern vibe. I've gotten several compliments from people that have visited. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Julisa

customer_reviews.title: Takes my office to another level!
customer_reviews.text: Upscale quality, gorgeous fixture. Was beast for me to install. Probably because it was too hot in my room the day I installed it and I was rushing to get this done!! But the final result was better than expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture, a little difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture for a great price. Three stars given as it was difficult to install. Instructions are lacking and supplied screws were actually too long to adhere the fixture to the ceiling. Had to buy new screws to adhere it, however despite the difficult install we are very happy with the product. Quality material and a great piece for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Court

customer_reviews.title: Very elegant
customer_reviews.text: Recently remodeled my kitchen and this lights gave my kitchen the final touch. They are elegant very bright originality had bought one but after seeing how beautiful it made my kitchen look decided to replace the other light. I would recommend this light because you can’t beat the prince for the elegant look
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lights, they are gorgeous. Changed out 2 in my kitchen and the whole space looks modern and bright. Really really love the design. Instructions for install are vague but my husband figured it out cause he has a lot of experience. Love these lights. Ordering 4 more for hallways and a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Ani S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good amount of light. I used 3 LED 100W, and they got the job done!
customer_reviews.author: annab.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful but not teh easiest to install
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp for a contemporary look. I paid someone to installed it but had to readjusted because he forgot the glass insert it has inside. overall happy with my purchase not so much with the handyman.
customer_reviews.author: JenSarmiento

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light and a great price
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this new fixture. Installation was not bad and can easily be tackled with 2 people. The biggest challenge was with the mounting bracket as getting the light fixture connected to it was a bit tricky. Overall, the quality is great and the price was very reasonable. We would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lights!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these lights, ordered 2 of them. Found almost the exact light on Ostock first but they were more expensive so I took a chance on these on Amazon and am not at all disappointed!! They were a little difficult to put up with the wires, which were a little thin and hard to work with but with a little patience you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: MlFrei40

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble but good price
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but difficult to assemble but for the price it’s good
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The light looks nice. It's fairly bright and the length can be widely adjusted. Takes regular 60 watt light bulbs. My husband installed this alone in about 30 minutes. I think it's a tad expensive but I'm happy with the purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking..
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this light. I really liked the pictures and for the price, I couldn't wait to get it. However, the white material underneath the metal is plastic and it just looks really cheap in real life. We are returning.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fixture...but have longer screws to install
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light for home front entry! A little challenging to install. Had to get longer screws to hold this new fixture in place.
customer_reviews.author: gwendy

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous style
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fixture. Beautiful design and finish. We replaced a lot of our fixtures with a similar style and I swear it helped sell our house tremendously! Sold in two days to a 30 year old, professional woman who fell in love with everything! A+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Light
customer_reviews.text: The light comes with several silver poles so that you can select the length which best fits your space. We wanted to make sure it wasn't too low in our dining room so we selected the shortest one. The light arrived quickly, we got an email from the company with instructions for assembly and instillation- they wanted to make sure we had an updated version. There was still the most recent version in the box when it came but it was so nice to have the digital copy and realize that they cared enough to make sure we had what we needed. The light is beautiful and I would highly recommend it and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL ceiling mount lighting brushed nickel
customer_reviews.text: When I saw it on Amazon I KNEW it would be perfect for our laundry room, and it is. We love the brushed nickel and the frosted glass diffuser. It looks so EXPENSIVE and it WASN’T! WIN~WIN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TK2

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two light for our laundry room. The lights are beautiful. Well made. Assembly was Okay, not easy but not difficult. (I like to put things together). We have not hung them yet due to the fact that we needed a different light box piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Design and the price
customer_reviews.text: I received my new drum light. I'm waiting for it to be installed. I like it and I think it was priced well. It will look good above my front door, because there is a glass window there.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Simple Elegance
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a builders grade chandelier with this . Love! Plenty of light for our 12 x 12 dining room. Hangs at the perfect height from our 8’ ceiling. Got dimmable LEDs, just right.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It’s so bright and replaced a out of date chandelier in our front entry. Looks beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I had to remove most of the rod so it didn't hang too low, but that was easy enough to do. The quality is good and it came in perfect condition. I have no complaints and recommend this light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Earthmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light, I just love it, My husband put it up with no problem. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Pla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and classy but check your box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but missing the glass. Check your box you have a 30 day window to get a replacement or a return done . Mine was missing the glass it still looks nice but I wish that I had been able to return it for another one. I ordered it before the room was done being remodeled and missed the return window
customer_reviews.author: Briana D.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install but looks great
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to get rid of the hanging chandelier in the nook so we can move the table when entertaining. Good lighting and good option to solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: frandma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beyond words!
customer_reviews.text: This light is georgous!!! Way better than I expected.My hubby likes it also.Too bad we are moving in a few months.If we need new lights in our new house,will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: michal ann

customer_reviews.title: nice & sleek
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking chandelier. Sleek, simple, and clean. Price was much better here in Amazon than other retailers. Installation was a bit more complicated because of the position of the screws (make sure you line everything up before starting the installation process). I was afraid item would arrive damaged (especially because it was glass parts), but packaging provided enough cushion.
customer_reviews.author: CustomerAtoZ

customer_reviews.title: Love the light and get plenty of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light if you want to modernized your home and receive compliments from your guests. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Helms

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my dining area outside of the great room.
customer_reviews.text: My dining area which off sets the great room area needed a shade more modern and light. This fixture looks very nice for the price. Not sure about the assembly and installation. I elected professional installation instead of electrocution.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Need help exchanging fixture
customer_reviews.text: I need to speak with someone from this company. Fixture does not hang level. One of 3 wires is about a qtr inch longer than other 2. We thought it would hang out and right itself but it hasn't. Want a new fixture sent before we return old one. It looks like we are past return time. Not sure. But expect company or Amazon to make good on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: The light came when promised, all parts intact. Great quality, better than I expected for the price. I had it install by an electrician. I think it’s beautiful. I used it in my walk-in closet.
customer_reviews.author: damsel

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and elegant for master bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing in my master bedroom. I suggest you have a professional electrician install this. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SUMMER TIME

customer_reviews.title: Perfect update
customer_reviews.text: I simply love this update and it was terrific price for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Rempe

customer_reviews.title: As described, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The price was good, arrived on time, and fairly easy to assemble and install. The instructions were easy to follow. Looks great in our dining area.
customer_reviews.author: Jacksje4

customer_reviews.title: Kira Home Sienna 15" 3-Light - Perfect Ceiling Semi-Flush Light Fixture
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Ceiling Semi-Flush Light Fixture for a great price and it was easy to install. I highly recommend the Kira Home Sienna 15" 3-Light fixture.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive light, but looks very cheap. Hanging over a table, it would be very obvious that the white liner is plastic. The metal is super thin. May be ok if hung high, but not over a table.
customer_reviews.author: susi

customer_reviews.title: Elegant looks, but quality could be better
customer_reviews.text: The light looks elegant and after installing 3 led bulbs it bright enough to lit up the room. We love the brightness. However, I wish the quality of the product could have been better. The Earthing copper wire was too flimsy it broke while installing the light. Secondly the nuts holding the light to the ceiling, one of them did not fit. I ended up using a regular nut, messes up the look.
customer_reviews.author: Online Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice fixture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Easy installation. Works well on angled ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Love this fixture!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fixture! It is beautiful. I ordered it in the bronze and absolutely love it in my office/spare room. So happy with it. Great style.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I have some formal style cabinets and stainless appliances. This drop light looks good in my breakfast nook next to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Gore

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Light
customer_reviews.text: We love our new hall light. It was easy to install and really updated the look of our front entry. Item was packed well and received promptly. Excellent price and service.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This product looks much more expensive than it costs. Yes, the material under the silver design on the side of the drum is plastic but you really cannot tell once it is hung. A note to remember - you need to push the support cables carefully into the center mount after you attach them to the drum. This will allow you to level the shade once it is hung.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a hallway. They were very easy for my handyman to install. I really like the way they look. They work great.
customer_reviews.author: Katlvr

customer_reviews.title: Same as all the others...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, the installation is needlessly difficult! But once I got it up there, it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: EquinoxV

customer_reviews.title: Assemble first then mount
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful light. It took a minute to understand how to put it together but once you know that it is easy. The main thing to know is that you assemble the whole thing first before you wire it in and attach it to the ceiling plate. I used LED light bulbs to make it easier on me in the future because I think it will be hard to change bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: SAT

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I really like these lights. Instalation was ok. I've had easier. Amount of light is just right for our hallway. I think when I need to change bulb it'll be a bit of a hassle. Seems like a good amount of nuts and washers for a simple task.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Ludka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! Installed in a home I just remodeled, and it's lovely. It's more delicate than you expect, so be sure to measure your space, first.
customer_reviews.author: Dht

customer_reviews.title: Not yet installed
customer_reviews.text: I am so sorry but cannot do a review yet. We are not putting the lights up until Sunday. I love the way the light looks but until it is up and running just cannot do review.
customer_reviews.author: Oooops!

customer_reviews.title: Love this light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light and the looks of it. I bought this for my kitchen also the one that matches it that hangs lower over my kitchen table. It was an easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Chandelier
customer_reviews.text: Very nice light fixture for eat in kitchen just a bit pricey when you look at materials used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Looked good in the pics but in real life its a bit chintzy. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris54

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my dining room. The light we had needed to be in a much larger area. When you get it - keep the box. The bottom part is in a hidden compartment of the box and we could easily see people throwing it away on error.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyAJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a low cost replacement for my outdated, gold dining room chandelier. This light arrived quickly and packaged well. The light was easy to install and looks nice. Easy to adjust and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kersten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you don’t mind adjusting it often
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Love the design, but the tension wires keep slipping. This is my second one. The first had the same problem. I’m readjusting it every couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Just as the picture shows. It’s very elegant yet simple. Great look especially for the price!! I have 3 60 watt equivalent led bulbs in there
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Just what We wanted...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. In fact we will be buying this pattern in 2 other fixtures. Very sleek and modern look. Hangs over our dining room table
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, packaged well.
customer_reviews.text: Turns a couple of bright white bulbs into a soft, warm glow. Perfect for most rooms. I like the look well enough, I might purchase one in the hanging style for another room.
customer_reviews.author: SkagitBeetFarmer

customer_reviews.title: Uplight
customer_reviews.text: This light looks amazing and it diffuses light upwards to make the whole room look great. We absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: lpj

customer_reviews.title: Spending money is worth
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light, it was looking small on pictures, but it’s not. Very good quality. And easy installation. Very good customer service from seller,
customer_reviews.author: Seema And Manoj

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, bright lighting
customer_reviews.text: Mine was missing one of the screws that connects the support lines to the lamp shade, my electrician said it is a metric sized screw so they could not replace it. They did find something to use to keep the lamp shade from hanging off balance, but I am not happy that the screw was not provided in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Durrett

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: Liked the light. Wish the directions to put it together were better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christine F.

customer_reviews.title: exactly whet I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Was not very hard to install and looks very nice in my contemporary eclectic style home.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: This light looked very nice in person like picture
customer_reviews.text: This light looked very nice in person like picture. I just didn’t read enough on the description to see that the shade was not glass and that’s what I wanted so I sent it back for that reason only
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love this light fixture. Looks very nice in our dining room and gives off the perfect amount of light. Chose this with the intention of using the colored Phillips hue bulbs and I’m sure they will look really nice when we put them in. Can’t speak to installation as we had an electrician friend install it, but he had no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lighting Update!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I hired a handyman to install. No way could I do it. He said directions were sparse. It looks good in my dining room!
customer_reviews.author: JanG

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Light looks great and at a reasonable cost. It took a bit longer for me to install than expected... a bit of trial and error to get the screw lengths determined. I would suggest using a Lutron dimmer to see the full range of light quality
customer_reviews.author: dth

customer_reviews.title: Hangs very low
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pendant light. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because while the length is adjustable, the shortest it can possibly be, is still longer than what I wanted. Other than that, it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: JamiR

customer_reviews.title: Video install helpful
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in dining room. Emits good light. Was easy to install for me- my first light fixture to install. The video was incredibly helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful modern look
customer_reviews.text: I Love this chandelier. Looks great although I asked my brother to move it to my kitchen from my dining room and....He accidentally broke the glass that covers the bulbs...its a beautiful piece for the price too. Would leave a pic but ....yea its broken will contact seller to see if I can get glass replaced.
customer_reviews.author: JOHANNA HH

product_meta.title: Kira Home Sienna 18" 3-Light Metal Drum Chandelier + Glass Diffuser, Brushed Nickel Finish
feature_bullets: TRANSITIONAL STYLE: Chandelier features a metal drum shade, glass diffuser and brushed nickel finish. The unique, intricate lattice design surrounding the sleek inner white shade provides a stylish, modern feel to elevate your home and decor

CHIC, SOPHISTICATED LOOK: Mount this beautifully crafted fixture in a variety of areas and decor. Dress up an entryway or foyer. Dazzling addition over a dining room table or hospitality location such as a lobby. Dimmer and sloped ceiling compatible
UL LISTED FOR YOUR SAFETY: UL listed for dry locations. Uses (3) LED, CFL, or up to 60W traditional incandescent medium base bulbs. Bulbs sold separately

DIMENSIONS: Chandelier: 19" (H) x 17.75" (D), Shade: 17.75" (D) x 4.25" (H), Canopy: 5" (D) x 0.75" (H). Includes (3) 12" and (2) 6" downrods for desired hanging height. Adjustable hanging height: 27.75"-69.5"

UNMATCHED QUALITY AND CUSTOMER CARE: Designed and supported in California. Quality, innovation, and attractive products are our motto. We provide a 1-year warranty when purchased from an authorized dealer. Shop with confidence!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars672 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
